CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: " Dazzling Displays Exhibit Top Products at Fair...3. Mrs. Nelson assists Robert French in demonstrating how to mix cocktails with Seagram's products...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Mary Ellen Nelson assists Robert "Bob" P. French Jr. with cocktail mixing demonstration on stage with Norge Appliances in the Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
